<br>

I am an Assistant Professor of Economics at Mohammed VI University in Morocco. My area of specialisation is econometrics (theoretical and applied) with a focus on estimation, hypothesis testing, causal inference, and machine learning. I am passionate about exploring the intersection of these fields to develop innovative solutions to interesting economic problems.
